```{r loadFile}
setwd("C:\\Users\\EdCarmen\\Documents\\CarmenProjects2016\\Gitsubclover\\Hardseeds")
getwd()

#create file
df_seed <- read.table("HardseedsLiveData.txt",header=TRUE)
head(df_seed)
# Jeito 1 de trocar formato (usando base R)
df_seed$Date <- dmy(df_seed$Date)

# jeito 2 de trocar formato (usando dplyr)
df_seed <- df_seed %>%
  mutate(Plot = as.factor(Plot), Block = as.factor(Block))%>%
  mutate(Soft = as.numeric(Soft),
         SoftDead = as.numeric(SoftDead),
         SoftGerm = as.numeric (SoftGerm),
         SoftAbn = as.numeric (SoftAbn),
         SoftUngerm = as.numeric (SoftUngerm)) %>%
  

summary(df_seed) # explore values
str(df_seed) # check formats
head(df_seed) # see to rows
tail(df_seed)



```



```{r CreatePercentSoft}
#Create a column that is the Accumulated Dead this is to calculate the Maximum hardseeds live 


df_hard_live_max <- df_seed %>%
  group_by(Plot,Depth) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-Date) %>% # 
  arrange(Round) %>% # need to tell which factor to accumulate within
  mutate(CumSoftDead = cumsum(SoftDead)) %>%
  #subtract number of dead seeds to find living seeds 
  mutate(Total_live = InitialSeedlotR1Number-max(CumSoftDead)) %>%
   mutate(Soft_live = SoftGerm + SoftUngerm + SoftAbn) %>%
  filter(Round==1) %>%
  mutate(Hard_perc = round(100-(Soft_live/Total_live*100),2))

  
summary (df_hard_live_max)

head(df_hard_live_max)
summary(df_hard_live_max) # explore values


```


```{r}

#Graph the maximum percentage of Live hardseeds!!! 

  df_hard_live_max %>%
  mutate(SowingD = dmy(SowingD)) %>%
  filter(Round == 1) %>%
  group_by(Cultivar,SowingD) %>%
  dplyr::select(Hard_perc) %>%
  summarise_each(funs(mean,sd)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=SowingD, y=mean, colour=factor(Cultivar), shape=factor(Cultivar))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
 facet_grid(.~Cultivar) +
  labs(x="Sowing Date",y="Maximum Percentage of LiveHardseeds") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean-sd/2,
                    ymax=mean+sd/2))+
  ylim(0,100)








```




```{r}

  
#Now need to correct the hardseed breakdown for the number of living seeds : use softLive and Total live
```

Calculate the mean and error bars for each cultivar 

```{r}
df_seed %>%
  mutate(hardSeed = 100-PropSoft) %>%
  mutate(SowingD = dmy(SowingD)) %>%
  #filter(Round == 1) %>%
  group_by(Cultivar,SowingD) %>%
  dplyr::select(hardSeed) %>%
  summarise_each(funs(mean,sd)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=SowingD, y=mean, colour=factor(Cultivar), shape=factor(Cultivar))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
 facet_grid(.~Cultivar) +
  labs(x="Sowing Date",y="Maximum Percentage of Hardseeds") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean-sd/2,
                    ymax=mean+sd/2))+
  ylim(0,100)

head(df_seed)

df_seedANOVA <- df_seed %>%
mutate(hardSeed = 100-PropSoft) %>%
filter(Round == 1) 

head(df_seedANOVA)



#ANOVA

#data transformation
df_seedANOVA$transf_no <- 1*(df_seedANOVA$hardSeed)
df_seedANOVA$transf_sqr <- sqrt(df_seedANOVA$hardSeed)
df_seedANOVA$transf_log <- log(df_seedANOVA$hardSeed)
df_seedANOVA$transf_acos <- acos(df_seedANOVA$hardSeed/100)
df_seedANOVA$transf_power3 <- (df_seedANOVA$hardSeed)^3




write.table(df_seedANOVA,"df_seedANOVA.txt")
file <- df_seedANOVA

x <- c( "transf_no",  "transf_sqr", "transf_log", "transf_acos", "transf_power3")

colsSelec <- match(x,colnames(file))

file %>%
  tidyr::gather("transformation" ,"value",colsSelec) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value)) + 
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_grid(.~transformation, scales="free" )

head(file)
head(df_seedANOVA)
#normality test
#tranform log was the best histogram so continue with it 
shapiro.test(file$transf_acos)

#QQplot
var<-file$transf_acos
qqnorm(var)
qqline(var, col = 2)
qqplot(var, rt(300))

#-------------------------------------------------

# Chosen transform log to do anova 
file.subset <- file 

head(file.subset, 50)
summary(file.subset)
my.anova <- aov(transf_acos ~ Cultivar*SowTreat + Block, data = file.subset)

summary(my.anova)
TukeyHSD(my.anova)

#Means separation 
(LSD.test(my.anova, c("Cultivar","SowTreat"), alpha= 0.05, p.adj="none"))
```
